dialogues.text: What. were Sun Lok and Menmet-Ra?

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: The wannabes. The good news: each doll is tougher to crack than the one before. It'll take Horvath hours to get the last one out, and that gives us time. You go back, grab the Encantus. I'll meet you back here in an hour.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: What are you gonna do?

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: There's someone I need to see.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: You're not gonna tell me who? What, you don't trust me?

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: You want to know how much I trust you? Balthazar can't believe he's about to do this. He holds o his CAR KEYS, drops them in Dave's hand. Dave grins, turns and heads for the Bentley.  74.

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: That smile's making me nervous, Dave! MOMENTS LATER -- THROOOOM!!! Dave revs the car, looking m determined than ever.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: (sotto) I've got someone to see, too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We SWOOP down from the sky and GLIDE through traffic, the veer onto the sidewalk and through a wrought-iron gate, i A GRAVEYARD ~-- nestled in the shadow of tall office towe An unexpected island of tranquil solemnity. We GLIDE through the graves, many of which are centuries finally arriving at... A MARBLE HEADSTONE -- where BALTHAZAR is crouched down. ‘ GRAVESTONE CAMEOS are pictured on the stone: one is of AURELIUS FLOOD... The other is VERONICA. Balthazar touches his hand to her oval-shaped photograph, holds it there.

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: Forgive me for what I have to do. Balthazar rises, turns and walks off. Only now do we see inscriptions on the headstone:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Curiously, no end date for Veronica.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dave runs up to "VINYL FEVER," an eclectic record shop, a peers in the window to see Becky inside. Dave starts to g in when he sees -- she's with Andre. Dave takes a breath.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage.  75.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Becky is going through the crates when she sees Dave.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: Your roommate thought you'd be here. Are you busy?

dialogues.speaker: ANDRE
dialogues.text: Yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dave feels Andre's stare, presses on.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: ‘Cause if you're not, there's something I want to show you.

dialogues.speaker: BECKY
dialogues.text: What about your "family emergency?"

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: Family --? Oh, yeah, it's all taken care of. Becky isn't buying this, or Dave, at the moment.

dialogues.speaker: BECKY
dialogues.text: Maybe some other time. Becky moves on to the next crate. Dave goes after her.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: Remember what you said in the radio station, how if someone told you you had an hour left to live, this is how you'd want to spend it?

dialogues.speaker: BECKY
dialogues.text: What does that have to do with --

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: Well, this is how I'd want to spend mine. Please, Becky, I said I'd make it up to you, and.I will...1I just need you to come with me. * Becky stares at Dave; she can't help but be stirred by passion. She turns to Andre, who shakes his head, turns around and walks out.

dialogues.speaker: BECKY
dialogues.text: (turns to Dave) This better be good.  76.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dave leads Becky into the room, which is still a wreck.

dialogues.speaker: BECKY
dialogues.text: So this is where the magic happens. Dave smiles: ‘You have no idea.’ Dave hurries over to the TESLA COILS we've seen mostly in He wheels the 7-foot tall coils to an open space in the r spaces them about 20' feet apart.

dialogues.speaker: BECKY
dialogues.text: What are those things?

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: Tesla coils. Tesla was a physicist. He was way ahead of his time. Dave turns out the lights, leaving only the glow of a lap screen at the table where he's standing.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: You're gonna wanna stand back. Becky grins: 'Sounds ominous.' She backs away from the co stands next to Dave. Dave smiles.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: Enjoy the show. Dave hits a key on the laptop, and -—- HUGE BOLTS OF ELECTRICITY -- leap between the coils! Thes aren't puny sparks but long tendrils of high-voltage plas that somehow, impossibly, CRACKLE WITH MUSIC: Bach's Tocc and Fugue melds seamlessly into the theme to "Sanford & S Becky laughs, SHOUTS with surprise at the incredible ligh and music show. These coils are loud.

dialogues.speaker: BECKY
dialogues.text: Where are the speakers?!

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: There are none! The coils fire at such a high frequency, the sparks create sound waves as they move through the air! . Suddenly the tune changes again -- into BECKY'S SONG. Bec shakes her head in amazement, turns to Dave, smiles.

dialogues.speaker: BECKY
dialogues.text: It's "Magic." Dave looks at Becky, her gorgeous smile, and he realizes:

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: Yeah...it is. As Dave turns back to the lightshow, it's Becky's turn to look at him. There's something about this guy. Something special. INT. UNDERGROUND TRAINING ROOM —- MOMENTS LATER The lights are back on. As Dave talks to Becky there's a newfound courage in his. eyes.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: Becky, there's something I've been wanting to tell you... INT. OLD SCIENCE BLDG. — CORRIDOR —- CONTINUOUS Balthazar storms through the double doors.

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: What part of "see you in an hour" wasn't clear?

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: ++.something I've been feeling since that day when we were kids. OUT IN THE CORRIDOR -- Balthazar pulls up, tenses as he listens. in. He hates himself for what he has to do next.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: Becky, I think you're -- Balthazar WHISPERS something and --

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: -- a total fraud.

dialogues.speaker: BECKY
dialogues.text: (smiles, thrown off) Gee, thanks, Dave.  78.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: I'm serious! Sure, you act all nice as long as I'm doing you a favor, getting your little radio show back on the air --

dialogues.speaker: BECKY
dialogues.text: That's not true!

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: -- but come on, I'm just a dork, right? The guy with the big "D" on his chest?!

dialogues.speaker: BECKY
dialogues.text: That is not what I think of you! Okay, maybe a little, at first. But there's something about you, I don't know what it is, but...it's special. IN THE CORRIDOR -- Balthazar feels terrible but doesn't s

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: Why don't you just --

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: -- leave, okay?! Just go! Becky stands there, hurt and in shock.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: It's not hard, Becky. You put one foot in front of the other. IN THE CORRIDOR -- Balthazar hides in shadow as Becky run out of the room, down the corridor and out the double-doo BACK IN THE ROOM -- Dave is still fired up when all at on he becomes aware of everything he just said.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: Oh, no...Becky, wait!!! Dave starts to run after her. Balthazar blocks the door.

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: It's better this way. Don't ask me how I know. I just do.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: You...you did that! Why?! (steps back) Don't come near me!!! (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: DAVE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Here you are, acting like you're my friend -- you're a liar! What else have you been lying to me about?!

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: Dave --

dialogues.speaker: WHAT ELSE
dialogues.text: Dave sees the ENCANTUS on the table. He waves his hand an the book FLIPS OPEN, the pages turning until we see -- The "LIVES OF THE SORCERERS," the entry for VERONICA FLOO

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: Sympathetic magic. I believe we covered it?

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: Dave, don't...STOP! As Balthazar lunges, Dave throws his hand up and Balthaza slows to 1/20th speed! SPEED BUMP.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: Took you ten years to learn that, huh?! (points at himself) Prime Merlinean! Dave puts his hand on the book, closes his eyes and -- BOOM!!! Light and time bend around us in ASTRAL PROJECTIO Dave is suddenly there in the -- ARCANA CABANA -- much as we remember it, only there's a s behind the counter: "AURELIUS FLOOD, PROPRIETOR." AURELIUS FLOOD and VERONICA stand side-by-side, staring w grave determination as -- BALTHAZAR -- blocks the door, stares menacingly at Aureli and Veronica. PLASMA BOLTS form around his clenched fists

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: Time for you to go, old man. Aurelius shakes his head, smiles.

dialogues.speaker: AURELIUS FLOOD
dialogues.text: When will you Morganians ever learn?

WHAT                        ! Dave stares in shock as -- Balthazar throws a PLASMA BOLT and Aurelius and Veronica to the air, conjuring BOLTS of their own. As a full-on SORCERER BATTLE erupts in the shop, we --

dialogues.speaker: SMASH BACK TO
dialogues.text: Dave rips his trembling hand from the page.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: Oh my god...it was all a lie... (turns to Balthazar) Who are you?! Balthazar struggles against the SUPER SLO-MO that's ensna him. It takes everything he's got to -- TEAR HIMSELF FREE! Balthazar hits the ground at full spee rolls behind a lab console to dodge the -- SALVO OF PLASMA BOLTS -- that Dave is throwing at him.

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: Dave, stop! -- Dave isn't hearing him. Balthazar ducks for cover, touche his hand to the floor and -- . THE FLOOR AT DAVE'S FEET -- suddenly LIQUEFIES, turning i a POOL OF WATER that Dave plunges into.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: Whoa! UNDERWATER -- Dave flails up toward the light when he see his WATCH MORPHING on his wrist, transforming into -- A STEEL SHACKLE. And at the other end of the chain: A CINDERBLOCK! Dave's eyes go wide as the last bubbles of air jettison from his lungs and he is dragged down toward blackness seemingly without end. As Dave reaches up toward the fading light -- A HAND SNAT HIS WRIST. Balthazar hoists Dave out of the water, throws him to the floor against a lab console.
Dave COUGHS violently, catches his breath, looks up at Balthazar standing over him.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: I want. The truth. Despite what just happened, there's not an ounce of conce in Dave's eyes. But the truth is something Balthazar seem unwilling or unable to go near.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: "Life shrinks or expands," remember? Well, from where I'm standing, you've got yourself a little shrinkage problem.

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: You're sitting, you little jerk.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: I need to hear it. You need to say” it. So what happened? Finally Balthazar exhales, and after years of keeping thi pent up inside...

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: I was a Morganian, trained in the Dark Arts from the time I was a boy. Fifteen years ago Horvath sent me on a mission: to steal the Grimhold...and kill Aurelius Flood.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: (nods) The battle I saw in the Encantus.

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: (smiles at the memory) Only you didn't see how it ended.

dialogues.speaker: THE ARCANA CABANA...
dialogues.text: QUICK CUTS -- The shop is demolished. Aurelius's shoulder bleeding as he and Veronica stand over a battered, semi- conscious Balthazar.

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Let's just say Aurelius and Veronica put a serious beat-down on yours truly. They could've killed me...
- Balthazar lies in bed, his wrists bound to the bedposts Aurelius and Veronica bring him some breakfast.

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR, (V.0O.)
dialogues.text: -.-instead they took me in, nursed me back to health. - Time has passed. Aurelius talks to Balthazar late into night, the shop illuminated by FLICKERING CANDLES.

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: They taught me there's no such thing as good magic or bad. The magic is neutral -- it's what's in a sorcerer's heart that matters. And when my heart began to change... - Balthazar and Veronica stand behind the display case, talking, smiling -- falling deeply in love.

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: .--let's just say my old pals weren't so thrilled.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FAST, BLURRY IMPRESSIONS -- A BATTLE takes place in a dri rainstorm. Balthazar, Aurelius and Veronica face off agai Horvath, Sun Lok, Menmet-Ra, and others who remain obscur LIGHTNING flashes as Horvath and Aurelius clash.

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: In the heat of the battle, Horvath managed to get Merlin's ring from Aurelius. For the first time in a thousand years... THE INNERMOST DOLL —-- flies open and an unforgettable si emerges -- the MONSTROUS SPECTRAL SPIRIT of Morgana le Fa

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: ---Morgana's spirit was free. MORGANA'S SPIRIT expands rapidly in size and energy. Vero SCREAMS as she is caught up in this maelstrom.

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: I've got to hand it to Aurelius. He moved fast, before she got too powerful...

Aurelius lifts his hand and the DRAGON RING leaps off Horvath's hand and onto Aurelius's. A wave of the old man hand rips the Grimhold open, unleashing -- A VORTEX OF ENERGY that encircles Morgana and the Morgani With a final surge of magic that will kill him --

dialogues.speaker: AURELIUS THRUSTS THEM INTO THE GRIMHOLD
dialogues.text: MOMENTS LATER -- Balthazar kneels beside the dying Aureli who places MERLIN'S RING in Balthazar's hand.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE, (V.0.)
dialogues.text: And Veronica...?

dialogues.speaker: SMASH BACK TO
dialogues.text: Balthazar looks up, still feeling the pain of that moment

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: I lost her. Dave can see how devastated Balthazar still is.

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: As sorcerers we're supposed to lead solitary lives, to put sorcery before love, self -- everything. I tried to have both, love and sorcery. What I got is a pain I've carried since the day I lost her.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: (realizes) You were trying to spare me from that, by driving Becky away. (then) Why is the Alchemy of the Heart in the center of the circle? Balthazar says nothing.

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: For the same reason your powers appeared on the day you fell for Becky. Love is the most powerful source of a sorcerer's magic. If he can tap it, he can't be stopped, but if he tries...he just might lose the love of his life.
Dave thinks about this, turns to Balthazar.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: Or he might win her. Their eyes meet. Perhaps each man has now taught somethin and each one learned, but a glimmer of hope -- for what, can't be sure -- shines in Balthazar's eyes. He nods.

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: Let's go find your girl.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Becky walks through the museum, a 1930's Modernist struct of glass and steel. She stops to gaze at a painting... THE CHAGALL from their childhood. A boy and girl levitate magically together in the nighttime sky.

dialogues.speaker: FLASH CUT TO
dialogues.text: YOUNG BECKY and DAVE stand before the painting.

dialogues.speaker: YOUNG DAVE
dialogues.text: Becky... She turns to him, hoping he feels the way she. does.

dialogues.speaker: YOUNG DAVE
dialogues.text: ++-never mind.

dialogues.speaker: SMASH BACK TO
dialogues.text: Becky gazes at the painting, shakes her head and walks ou MOMENTS LATER -- Becky meanders through a sculpture galle when a VOICE comes over the P.A.

dialogues.speaker: P.A. ANNOUNCER
dialogues.text: Your attention, please. The museum will be closing in fifteen minutes. Suddenly a PRETTY GIRL (12) runs up to Becky, looking anx if not terrified. Her clothes give her away as a tourist.

dialogues.speaker: GIRL
dialogues.text: Can you help me? I lost my dad! He was right next to me then all of a sudden I couldn't find him!

dialogues.speaker: BECKY
dialogues.text: Okay, don't worry...
Becky looks for a guard but there are none around. The gi is on the verge of tears.

dialogues.speaker: BECKY
dialogues.text: I'm gonna help you, okay? We'll find him together.

dialogues.speaker: GIRL
dialogues.text: Oh, thank you!

dialogues.speaker: BECKY
dialogues.text: He's prob'ly going crazy looking for you. Where was the last place you saw him?

dialogues.speaker: GIRL
dialogues.text: This way... The girl leads Becky out of the gallery and down a corrid She takes Becky's hand, flashes a relieved smile.

dialogues.speaker: GIRL
dialogues.text: My name's Abbie. I'm from Massachusetts.

dialogues.speaker: BECKY
dialogues.text: Don't worry, Abbie. We'll find him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dave leads Balthazar through the museum.

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: How do you know she'll be here? Did you put a tracking spell on her? Dave arrives at THE CHAGALL. He gazes at the painting, smiles at the memory.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: Something like that. Dave scans the room, looking left and right. At the far e of the museum he sees Becky just as she and Abbie duck ar a corner and disappear. Balthazar smiles at Dave: 'Go get her.' But as Dave runs off, Balthazar spins around -- SENSES SOMETHING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The drone of MACHINERY and the exposed conduit on the wal gives us the sense that this is a utility corridor.  86.

dialogues.speaker: BECKY
dialogues.text: Are you sure it was this way?

dialogues.speaker: ABBIE
dialogues.text: Yeah, he was just up here! Abbie pulls Becky around the corner, right into -- A VISION FROM HELL. CHERNABOG -- towers over Becky, a hulking, 15-foot tall d with glowing eyes, devil's horns and massive bat wings. Becky gasps, too terrified to move, to speak.

dialogues.speaker: ABBIE
dialogues.text: We found him! Becky turns to see Abbie, smiling demonically as her clot transform from jeans and a t-shirt into a 17th century BL PURITAN DRESS and HEAD SCARF, TO REVEAL -- The last Morganian and the Original Creepy As Hell Little Girl -- ABIGAIL WILLIAMS. Becky's scream dies in her lungs as Chernabog snatches he by the throat, pulls her up to his GLOWING DEMONIC EYES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dave runs around the corner into the UTILITY CORRIDOR, th around the next corner where Becky was just a moment ago. At the end of the hall a STEEL DOOR swings the last coupl inches, and SHUTS. Where the heck is she going?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Balthazar doesn't like what he's sensing. He runs into th UTILITY CORRIDOR -- no sign of Dave. He sees the STEEL DO bolts for it and runs into --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A CONCUSSION BLAST nails Balthazar, sends him skidding ac the floor into a massive BOILER -- out cold. The MECHANICAL ROOM beneath the museum is a 70-year-old c of PUMPS, PIPING, BOILERS, GENERATORS and HVAC EQUIPMENT.
Dave is in agony on the concrete floor, having met the sa welcome a moment before. He looks up, sees Maxim..

dialogues.speaker: MAXIM HORVATH
dialogues.text: Boy, did you guys take the bait. +.-then Abigail, and finally Chernabog, holding the terri Becky in his clutches. Dave stares in shock. He's seen some weird sh*t in the la 72 hours, but nothing like Chernabog.

dialogues.speaker: MAXIM HORVATH
dialogues.text: You're wondering how we got here... Horvath nods toward a shadowy corner and an ancient, out- service ELEVATOR, its art deco doors draped with cobwebs.

dialogues.speaker: MAXIM HORVATH
dialogues.text: A portal, installed .in the thirties by your Master's Master's Master. It can be used to travel across the dimensions, or within them. ‘ (off Chernabog) Cabs just won't stop for him. Chernabog utters a low, monstrous GROWL.

dialogues.speaker: MAXIM HORVATH
dialogues.text: Say hello to Chernabog, Conjurer of Souls...and this is Abigail Williams. Abigail smiles rather sweetly. Dave sees Balthazar starti to come to. Dave gets to his feet, trying to buy some tim

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: She's the last sorcerer before Morgana? I thought each one of you was supposed to be tougher than the one before. Abigail's smile morphs into.a chilling scowl.

dialogues.speaker: MAXIM HORVATH
dialogues.text: Oh, boy. Prob'ly shouldn't have said that. Abigail starts walking toward Dave. Dave takes a step bac

dialogues.speaker: MAXIM HORVATH
dialogues.text: You know the Salem Witch Trials? Well, Abigail here is the little devil who started it all...

Dave stares in horror as ABIGAIL'S MOUTH opens at a grote 90 degree angle and -- A SWARM OF BATS comes flying out! Dave SCREAMS as the bats swarm him, pummelling him. He fa to his knees, conjures a FIREBALL to try and scatter them But the fireball MORPHS INTO a giant HELLFIRE BAT that dive-bombs Dave, sends him scrambling for cover! Chernabog grins, his massive hand splayed out. Horvath shakes his head at Dave.

dialogues.speaker: MAXIM. HORVATH
dialogues.text: I wouldn't play with fire, scarecrow. (off Chernabog) Not with that guy in the room. Horvath nods and the SWARM OF BATS and the HELLFIRE BAT disappear. Dave falls to the ground on his back, opens hi eyes to see Horvath standing over him.

dialogues.speaker: MAXIM HORVATH
dialogues.text: You have something that belongs to me. THE DRAGON RING -- almost seems to recoil as Horvath reac down to pluck it from Dave's finger. But Horvath is a Pri Merlinean. The dragon has no choice as Horvath takes the ring and SLIPS IT ON HIS FINGER. ACROSS THE ROOM -- Balthazar struggles to his knees.

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: No... Horvath grins, reaches into his coat and pulls out -- THE INNERMOST DOLL. MORGANA LE FAY stares out at us, a chilling medieval rendering of the dark sorceress.

dialogues.speaker: NO
dialogues.text: Balthazar lunges at Horvath, but Horvath -- his power magnified by Merlin's ring -- throws out his hand and sen Balthazar flying into the wall, pinning him there.

dialogues.speaker: HORVATH
dialogues.text: Relax, Blake. Enjoy the show.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE MORGANA NESTING DOLL -- hovers in mid-air, held aloft tendrils of DARK ENERGY that Horvath has conjured. Abigai and Chernabog look on. Balthazar is pinned against the wall; Dave and Becky are to stand together. Things look bleak.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: Becky, those things I said before...that wasn't me. But Becky is beyond terrified.

dialogues.speaker: BECKY
dialogues.text: What've you gotten me into? Dave looks to Balthazar. He was right about mixing sorcer and love. THE NESTING DOLL -- starts to GROW, and buckle outward, n resembling a giant egg -- or more accurately an EGG SAC, because its outer shell is no longer hard but malleable.. AND THERE'S SOMETHING INSIDE -- TRYING TO GET OUT. THE EGG SAC -- bends in places, stretches out in the shap a hand, a head. We are witnessing a sickening birth. Dave and Becky cringe as a RIPPING SOUND gives way to -- A FEMALE HUMANOID FIGURE -- tears its way out of the doll rises up and straightens... We TILT UP the woman's body as the SLIMY MUCK that covers flesh rearranges itself on her skin, morphing into a purp black dress that hugs her every curve, TO REVEAL -- MORGANA LE FAY is the wickedest woman in the world, and t most seductive. A wanton smile crosses her lips as we TIL UP to her face to reveal the most shocking thing of all. all appearances -- THIS WOMAN IS VERONICA FLOOD. Dave gasps, in shock. Balthazar shakes with emotion. Horv smiles at his Queen.

dialogues.speaker: MAXIM HORVATH
dialogues.text: Morgana, you're free... Morgana smiles, draws her lips close to Horvath's -- and BITCH-SLAPS HIM. Blood trickles from Horvath's lip.

dialogues.speaker: MORGANA LE FAY
dialogues.text: It took you long enough. Horvath wipes his lip: God, she's hot. Chernabog bows his head to Morgana. Abigail curtsies.

dialogues.speaker: MORGANA LE FAY
dialogues.text: (off Dave and Becky) And these?

dialogues.speaker: MAXIM HORVATH
dialogues.text: She's a citizen. He's the Prime Merlinean, if you can believe it. Morgana takes Dave's chin, examining him. Shakes her head

dialogues.speaker: MORGANA LE FAY
dialogues.text: They don't make them like they used to.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: (in shock) You're Veronica Flood...you died. Morgana smiles darkly.

dialogues.speaker: MORGANA LE FAY
dialogues.text: My dear young man... Morgana draws her lips seductively close to his.

dialogues.speaker: MORGANA LE FAY
dialogues.text: .«-.do I feel dead to you?

dialogues.speaker: STOP
dialogues.text: Morgana turns, sees Balthazar for the first time, realize

dialogues.speaker: MORGANA LE FAY
dialogues.text: You haven't told him, have you? (smiles at Dave) You're gonna love this. Fifteen years ago, after centuries trapped in Merlin's damn little cage, I was freed. But my spirit can't exist in the open for long -- it needs a host. Dave looks to the devastated Balthazar as the truth becom crushingly clear. Morgana gazes admiringly at her body.  91.

dialogues.speaker: MORGANA LE FAY
dialogues.text: I hardly got to enjoy this little filly before Aurelius put me back in the Grimhold. I can't wait to take her for a ride. Balthazar quakes with rage. Morgana smiles.

dialogues.speaker: MORGANA LE FAY
dialogues.text: I bet that was fun...the love of your life sitting just a few feet away, right there on the shelf. And the only thing standing between you and her...is them. CHERNABOG, HORVATH, ABIGAIL -- stare demonically as Morga waves her hand and sends the shaken Balthazar sliding dow the wall to his feet.

dialogues.speaker: MORGANA LE FAY
dialogues.text: And your job -- no, your sworn duty -- is to make sure you never see her. again... (smiles) © You've just got to love life's little twists and turns.

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: Veronica...it's me. } For a moment there is a glimmer in Morgana's eyes -- of recognition and humanity. Then the moment is gone. Morgana nods to Horvath: ‘Kill them.' Horvath powers up f a spell when -- VOOSH! AN INK-BLACK CLOUD douses everyone in midnight.

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: Runt!! Dave feels Balthazar hoist him by the shirt and pull him fast as he can toward the elevator.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: Wait! I don't have Becky! Morgana throws a BLAST OF WIND that dissipates the cloud.

dialogues.speaker: MORGANA LE FAY
dialogues.text: Nice try. It takes just seconds. Morgana throws an ALL-CONSUMING FIREBALL at Balthazar and Dave...  om, 92. Dave looks back, sees Becky SCREAM as Chernabog snatches in his arms... Horvath gasps as MERLIN'S RING uncoils and the DRAGON LEA from his finger... Balthazar pulls Dave into the elevator and dives for the antiquated UP/DOWN LEVER... THE FIREBALL -- flies in on Balthazar and Dave... THE DRAGON RING -- leaps across the floor in two big boun jumps into the elevator and onto Dave's finger, and then The fireball EXPLODES into the elevator shaft, incinerati everything in it! As the flames subside, the Morganians stand at what used be the elevator door. Dave and Balthazar are --

dialogues.speaker: MAXIM HORVATH
dialogues.text: Gone. And so is Merlin's ring.

dialogues.speaker: MORGANA LE FAY
dialogues.text: It doesn't matter. Its work is done.

dialogues.speaker: ABIGAIL WILLIAMS
dialogues.text: What should we do with this one? Morgana smiles as Becky struggles in Chernabog's arms.

dialogues.speaker: MORGANA LE FAY
dialogues.text: I'm sure I'll think of something. INT. ANTIQUE ELEVATOR —- SPACETIME Balthazar and Dave grip the walls as the elevator zooms through SPACETIME in all directions at once. Hang on!!! KA-BOOM! The elevator comes to a jarring stop as Dave and Balthazar go flying out the door through some TREE BRANCH landing in the mud in a -- DENSE THICKET OF MANGROVES... They look around, gather their senses. We seem to have landed in a PREHISTORIC COASTAL JUNGLE. An eerie RED LIGH suffuses everything as Dave follows Balthazar toward the source of the light.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: Are we in another dimension? They come out of the trees, look out on... EXT. BERNIE'S MATTRESS SUPERSTORE — NIGHT Bernie's is closed but its giant NEON SIGN bathes everyth in red light. A two-lane road snakes around toward a 7-ELEVEN, a BLOCKBUSTER, a LAUNDROMAT.

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: (shakes his head) Staten Island. Let's go. INT. HORVATH'S PENTHOUSE ~— NIGHT The scattered halves of the GRIMHOLD sit on Horvath's conjuring table, not far from -- Becky, who is shackled to an IRON MAIDEN, one of Horvath' more bizarre antiques. She works frantically to get free, all the while looking up through the skylight toward --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Morgana, Horvath, Abigail and Chernabog stand on the balc gazing out. Beyond the lake and the park, the lights of t city sparkle in the night. Chernabog GROWLS at Morgana's shoulder. She cuffs his hea as if he were a long-lost pet.

dialogues.speaker: MORGANA LE FAY
dialogues.text: You want to play, is that it? (off the skyline) Go have some fun. Chernabog flies off into the night sky.

dialogues.speaker: MORGANA LE FAY
dialogues.text: Ah, Merlin, how I wish you could've seen this. The birth of a New Age, and a New Reign... MORGANA'S EYES -- her pupils, irises, everything.-- go suddenly, hideously BLACK.

dialogues.speaker: MORGANA LE FAY
dialogues.text: ...long live the Queen.  94. Morgana spreads her arms to the sky; her RING is a black five-pointed star that reflects no light. MUSIC UP -- The spine-tingling strains of "Night on Bald Mountain," from the Chernabog scene in "Fantasia."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A WAVE OF DARK CLOUDS -- unfurls over the city, scraping tops of the SKYSCRAPERS.

dialogues.speaker: MORGANA LE FAY, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: The light of the Moon marks the dawn of a New Age...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE "WALL STREET BULL" STATUE -- suddenly comes to life, bucking and kicking, SMASHING cars with its hooves and ho

dialogues.speaker: MORGANA LE FAY, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: .»-.an age of power and bewitchment...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not many people are here at this hour: some NYU STUDENTS heading home, a few HOMELESS PEOPLE.

dialogues.speaker: MORGANA LE FAY, (0.S8.)
dialogues.text: .-.an age of glory in the Dark Arts. HANGMAN'S ELM -- creaks in the wind. The students look up gasp in horror as -- CHERNABOG -- swoops down from the sky! He lands atop the WASHINGTON SQUARE ARCH, unleashes a horrific cry. His bod begins to sway, seemingly possessed as he summons -- THE WRAITHS! Part specter and part corpse, they fly up through the pavement or jump down from HANGMAN'S ELM, som with NOOSES still around their necks, others riding demon SPECTRAL HORSES. Ghoulish traitors of the Revolutionary War, the Wraiths f muskets that SHATTER the windows on Fourth Street. Tonight, hell has come to Washington Square.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: oe, 95. EXT. HORVATH'S TOWER — OBSERVATION BALCONY - CONTINUOUS Morgana is flanked by Horvath and Abigail as an EERIE FOG enshrouds the city and distant EXPLOSIONS roll like soft thunder across the horizon. Morgana smiles darkly.

dialogues.speaker: MORGANA LE FAY
dialogues.text: The Age of Men is at an end. Let the Age of Sorcerers begin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Wraiths stage an onslaught, spreading chaos as they r and hack their way down into --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PEOPLE run SCREAMING, taking cover where they can, but th SPECTRAL RIDERS will not be stopped. .In the midst of all this mayhem -- A SUBWAY TRAIN -- pulls into the stop. The doors, open an Balthazar and Dave step out.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: See there? Public transportation. Balthazar is unimpressed. A SCREAMING. WOMAN runs by, bei chased by a BRITISH REDCOAT WRAITH wielding a bayonet... Balthazar clotheslines the Wraith out of frame, STOMPS on to a grotesque CRUNCHING SOUND.

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: Wraiths. This is Chernabog's work. THE WRAITHS jump off the platform and disappear into the shadows of the UPTOWN TUNNEL.

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: They're heading to the Park, trying to link up with Morgana.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: That must be where they've got Becky! Dave starts to run. Balthazar grabs his arm.

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: We've gotta turn off the tap on these Wraiths first. See if we can't make this a fair fight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Balthazar and Dave run up the subway steps to the street, nailing wraiths with CONCUSSION BLASTS as they go.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: They're coming from the Square. This way! Balthazar stops him, shakes his head.

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: I called ahead for a ride. Dave looks up, smiles as -- THE CHRYSLER BUILDING EAGLE -- swoops down from the sky, slamming into WRAITHS as it zooms in low over the street! Balthazar and Dave get a running start and jump on the ea as it flies by.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chernabog stands atop the arch, conjuring Wraiths. He hea a WHOOSH behind him, spins around to see -— THE EAGLE -- flies in hard and fast, steel talons flashin WHAM! Chernabog is blasted off the arch, goes flying into BOOM! -- HANGMAN'S ELM, knocking the last few Wraiths fro their nooses like overripe fruit. Balthazar and Dave jump off the eagle as it swoops in low A DOZEN WRAITHS -- are converging on the only people left the park, a bunch of cowering, terrified NYU STUDENTS.

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: (powers up for a spell) Mine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But Dave raises his hand, a living Tesla Coil as a LIGHTN BOLT leaps from his hand and bounces from one Wraith to t next, frying them until -- KA-SPLATTT!!! The wraiths explode, showering the students WRAITH GUTS. Dave smiles awkwardly as the freaked-out students start SCREAMING.

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: I believe I said "Mine!"

A MASSIVE FIREBALL -- flies in at them. Balthazar grabs D and pulls him into -- THE PARK'S FAMOUS FOUNTAIN. HELLFIRE licks the surface of the water as Dave and Balthazar stay under. TWO MONSTROUS CLAWS -- pluck them out of the water, SLAM into each other, toss them off in different directions. Dave lands hard near the base of the WASHINGTON SQUARE AR CHERNABOG -- stands over him, unleashes a chilling WAR CR He's about to stomp on Dave's head-when suddenly -- IT'S HORVATH who lies there cowering, not Dave.

dialogues.speaker: MAXIM HORVATH
dialogues.text: Chernabog, don't! Chernabog hesitates -- all the opening Balthazar needs to throw a CONCUSSION BLAST that sends Chernabog flying -- WHAM!!! -- into one of the arch's concrete supports. Gravity does the rest. Chernabog looks up as the MASSIVE CONCRETE ARCH comes down on him -- KA-BOOOOM!!! When the dust clears, Chernabog lies unconscious amid the rubble. Balthazar helps Horvath up.

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: Not bad. Horvath MORHPS into Dave. No more wraiths are emerging from their graves, but the o who've already escaped continue to wreak havoc in the squ

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: Looks like no more wraiths are coming out, but the ones who are already here...

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: They answer to Morgana now...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE WRAITHS -- emerge from the 59th street subway to rais hell: attacking cars, battling overmatched COPS. A T.V. REPORTER ducks for cover, reporting live.  98.

dialogues.speaker: REPORTER
dialogues.text: .-.the reports from Washington Square are true! They're coming up from the tunnels...I can't begin to describe what I'm seeing right now! THE NEWS CAMERAMAN -- double-checks what his eyes are see against what's appearing in his viewfinder.

dialogues.speaker: CAMERAMAN
dialogues.text: What the hell?! IN THE VIEWFINDER -- POLICE OFFICERS battle and terrified YORKERS run away from -- ABSOLUTELY NOTHING. On camera, the wraiths are invisible.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Morgana, Horvath and Abigail listen to the din of chaos coming closer. Horvath glances down through the skylight

dialogues.speaker: MAXIM HORVATH
dialogues.text: The Grimhold! EMPTY SHACKLES lie beside the iron maiden where Becky was moments ago -- AND THE GRIMHOLD IS GONE.

dialogues.speaker: MORGANA LE FAY
dialogues.text: (eyes darkening) She'll try to get the doll to them. We won't let her. EXT. CENTRAL PARK -— NIGHT Becky runs as fast as she can with the Grimhold.. Above h PALE ORANGE CLOUDS fly across an EERIE PURPLE SKY -- a sc but strangely beautiful night. Becky runs into a TUNNEL beneath an OLD STONE BRIDGE. ABIGAIL -- appears at the end of the tunnel, head bowed i demonic stare. Becky SCREAMS, runs out the way she came. Abigail levitat into the air after her. Becky ducks into some WOODS. A CANINE GROWL stops her col leaves her panting with fear. TWO RED EYES -- appear in the shadows, belonging to eithe the biggest wolf we've ever seen, or --  99. MAXIM HORVATH -- steps out of the shadows. Becky trembles Horvath raises his hand, his SKULL RING glowing.

dialogues.speaker: MAXIM HORVATH
dialogues.text: What should I turn you into? A pig? A mule?’ Or maybe even...the perfect woman? Becky tries to scream -- BUT HAS NO MOUTH. She falls to t ground with a muffled cry. Horvath moves in to pick up th Grimhold... WHAM!!! A CONCUSSION BLAST sends Horvath flying. Becky puts her hands to her lips, feels that they are the Suddenly Dave is there, helping her up.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: Are you okay? Becky smiles, holds onto him tightly.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: I've got to stop these guys.

dialogues.speaker: MORGANA LE FAY, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Oh, is that right? Dave and Becky whirl around.

dialogues.speaker: MORGANA LE FAY
dialogues.text: You and what army? MORGANA -- stands there, flanked by Horvath and Abigail, we PULL BACK TO REVEAL... A BATTALION OF WRAITHS -- their claw-like hands holding s and muskets, their skulls grinning murderously in the moonlight. The Wraiths have cut off Dave from the Grimhol Dave and Becky step back, in awe of these horrors.

dialogues.speaker: MORGANA LE FAY
dialogues.text: Ah, the proud Merlinean line. Names like Ambrosius...Maltwood... Garcia de Ayala...Dave. (shakes her head) How the mighty have fallen. Merlin would've thanked me. for what I'm about to do. But as she raises her hand --

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: Or he would've mopped up the floor with you... Morgana turns toward the voice.

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: ++-again. BALTHAZAR -- steps forward, flanked by the CHRYSLER EAGLE the massively muscled ROCKEFELLER ATLAS, as epically hero the day Dave first saw him. Dave and Becky smile. Surprisingly, so does Morgana.

dialogues.speaker: MORGANA LE FAY
dialogues.text: Now this is how we used to do it. Morgana throws a PLASMA BOLT, and it's on: a clash as phy as it is magical, with our heroes having to simultaneousl battle the MORGANIANS and the WRAITHS. QUICK CUTS -- Balthazar dodges Horvath's LIGHTNING BOLTS, seizes a WRAITH'S SWORD and fights like a man possessed.. MORGANA -- summons a CYCLONE down from the skies, sends i careening toward Dave... DAVE -- throws out his hands, then rips them apart, teari Morgana's CYCLONE into a dozen MINI-CYCLONES, each of whi flies into a WRAITH, blasting it to smithereens. BECKY -- sees the GRIMHOLD on the ground and runs for it. Suddenly Becky falls -- trapped in QUICKSAND! Abigail clo in for the kill. Dave sees Becky in trouble, runs to help her.

dialogues.speaker: MORGANA LE FAY
dialogues.text: Fool. Morgana sends a CONCUSSION BLAST rippling through the air ATLAS -- jumps in front of Dave, absorbing the impact. Atlas punches Morgana with a massive STEEL FIST. Her head barely turns. She backhands Atlas, sends him flying. ABIGAIL -- sees Dave on his way to help Becky. She opens her mouth at a horrific angle, only this time she projectile-vomits --

But the CHRYSLER EAGLE flies in, sends the wasps scatteri Abigail has no time to get out of the way as -- WHAM!!! The eagle clips her with its wing -- KNOCKS HER UNCONSCIOUS. BECKY -- is about to be pulled under the quicksand when D lifts her out with an ANTI-GRAVITY SPELL. He levitates in the air to catch her and for a heartbeat they hang there the boy and girl in the Chagall painting. Dave sets the two of them down, looks into Becky's eyes.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: Becky, I -- But Horvath touches his hand to the ground, sends a RIPPL SHOCKWAVE that uproots Dave and sends him slamming into a lamp post.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: Unnfffi!! As ATLAS and the CHRYSLER EAGLE wade into the slashing WRAITHS, and Balthazar faces off against Morgana, Horvath casts a withering assault of sorcery at Dave... A FIREBALL nearly incinerates him. A CONCUSSION BLAST sen him flying into -- WHAM!!! -- an aluminum TOOL SHED. Dave plows through the shed and keeps going, landing hard on his back. Horvath walks toward him, picks up a shovel. In Horvath's hands the shovel MORPHS INTO an EXECUTIONER'S AXE.

dialogues.speaker: MAXIM HORVATH
dialogues.text: There's no magic or science that can save you now, apprentice. Horvath stands over Dave, brings the axe back. Dave looks over, sees Becky looking sorrowfully at him. T unexpectedly, he smiles.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: I love you. AN UNTAPPED POWER lights in Dave's eyes. Becky smiles through her tears as Dave looks up at Horvath.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: Objects in motion stay in motion...
Horvath pauses with the axe --

dialogues.speaker: HORVATH
dialogues.text: Boy, what are you talking about? WHOOSH! Horvath looks up as -- A ROCK the size of a basketball nails him in the chest an sends him flying -- WHAM! -- into a TREE TRUNK.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: -+-unless acted upon by an opposing force. Horvath is in serious pain as he gets up, sees Dave walki toward him. Dave looks transformed, as if a veil has been lifted, and science and magic are one within him.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: Newton's first law. Number two? The acceleration of an object is directly proportional to the net force acting on it. For example: Dave throws a massive PLASMA BOLT that SLAMS into Horvath drops him like a stone.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: And my personal favorite, number three: for every action... Dave hoists Horvath in the grip of an INVISIBLE GRAVITY a flings him -~ WHAM! -- into the base of a CIVIL WAR MONUM spider-webbing the marble. Horvath staggers, teeters like a punch-drunk boxer.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: ...there's an equal and opposite reaction. WHUMP! Horvath lands hard, out cold. Dave stands triumphantly over him, a sorcerer now.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: Physics. MEANWHILE... Balthazar and Morgana wage FIERCE SORCERER WARFARE, mixin spells culled from all Seven Alchemies -- a Master Class.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: en, 103. Fighting Morgana is all the more difficult because for ev PLASMA BOLT he sends slamming into Morgana, Balthazar kno it's Veronica's body he's harming. But that doesn't stop him. Morgana goes down, winces in pain. For a moment Balthazar forgets who he's dealing wit

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: Veronica, you don't want to do this. A moment is all it takes. Morgana throws out her hand, BASHES Balthazar with an invisible force -- then brings h hand down, SMASHING him to the ground.

dialogues.speaker: MORGANA LE FAY
dialogues.text: It's Morgana. And I so do. Balthazar lies face-down in the dirt, in agony. As Morgan approaches for the kill, Balthazar rolls over, TO REVEAL THE GRIMHOLD -- is in his hands, transformed to show ALL MORGANIANS on the outermost doll.

dialogues.speaker: MORGANA LE FAY
dialogues.text: Nice try...but you're not the Prime Merlinean.

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: No...he is. They move in perfect sync. Balthazar throws. the Grimhold into the air; Dave lifts his hand, freezes it in place. The DRAGON'S EYES glow on Dave's ring as he turns his outstretched hand to the side -- and the doll TWISTS OPEN

dialogues.speaker: NOLL
dialogues.text: A BLINDING LIGHT -- shines in the seam of the doll, swell into a VORTEX OF LIGHT. Morgana digs her fingers into the ground, fighting the aw suction that pulls her toward the light. ABIGAIL -- SCREAMS as she tumbles through the air, gets sucked into the vortex. HORVATH -- resists for as long as he can, until he, too, vanishes into the light. Becky ducks as the unconscious CHERNABOG comes flying thr the air into the vortex.  Om 104. MORGANA -- can't hold on! She slips, flies through the ai A HAND -- shoots out, catches her hand. BALTHAZAR'S!

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: No!!! What are you doing?! Balthazar holds onto Morgana with all the strength he has left.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: Balthazar, let her go!

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: (shakes his head) Not this time...not this time!!! THE GRIMHOLD VORTEX -- increases in power, its outer edge just a few feet from Balthazar and Morgana. Balthazar's eyes meet Morgana's -- but they're not Morgan they're Veronica's! And then -- A MONSTROUS SPECTRAL CREATURE -- part woman, part demon, wrenched free of Veronica's body. THE REAL MORGANA LE FAY

dialogues.speaker: VERONICA
dialogues.text: (human again) Balthazar!

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: Hang on!!! THE SPECTRAL MORGANA SCREAMS, a hideous, defiant SHRIEK.. TOO LATE! The evil spirit is sucked into the VORTEX as a MASSIVE BOOM OF THUNDER echoes across New York. And when echo fades... THE SEALED GRIMHOLD -- sits in a smoking, smoldering crat THE WRAITHS -- are suddenly drawn up into the air, away f their battle with Atlas and the Chrysler Eagle, growing m spectral every second.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As if called by the toll of an unseen bell, the Wraiths descend from the low clouds, returning beneath the paveme to the sleep of their graves...  105.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dawn's first light appears in the sky. Balthazar looks up wraps the unclothed, unmoving Veronica in his arms.

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: Veronica...Veronica! Veronica eyes flutter open. Balthazar holds his breath.

dialogues.speaker: VERONICA
dialogues.text: Where's father...? Balthazar shudders with emotion, begins to weep. Veronica pulls him close, holds him tight and doesn't let go.

dialogues.speaker: VERONICA
dialogues.text: It's okay, my love. It's okay... Dave and Becky look on, deeply moved. Behind them are ATL and the CHRYSLER EAGLE. Dave and Becky share a smile of amazement as the statues nod, then disappear into the mis

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: POLICE CARS flood into the park across the 65TH STREET TRANSVERSE, as we CRANE DOWN TO... A CENTRAL PARK HORSE CARRIAGE -- trots out of the park. D holds the reins, Becky is beside him. They smile. Balthazar and Veronica are in the back. Veronica wears Balthazar's coat as Balthazar pulls her close and we --

dialogues.speaker: MATCH DISSOLVE TO
dialogues.text: INT. NEW ARCANA CABANA ~— DAY The Central Park carriage ride in now the last page of th Encantus. Dave closes the book, smiles. He's standing in the just reopened ARCANA CABANA, as cluttered and creepy as. the o one, yet Dave is strangely at home now. A T.V. drones on the shelf.

dialogues.speaker: FEMALE REPORTER
dialogues.text: So, what did happen in Washington Square, in Central Park, in the Sixth Avenue subway tunnel? Was it a once-in-a-lifetime weather event? (MORE)

dialogues.speaker: FEMALE REPORTER, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: A supernatural phenomenon as witnesses insist? And given the lack of photographic or other physical evidence, is it possible we may never know the truth...? The REPORTER stands in Rockefeller Center. Dave sees ATLA looming behind her, and smiles. AT THE FRONT OF THE STORE -- Balthazar tries to close a s

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: ...seriously, what says Valentine's Day like human hearts stuffed in a jar? THE CUSTOMER -- smiles awkwardly, turns and walks out.

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: Fine! Go with the Godiva!

dialogues.speaker: BECKY
dialogues.text: We need to seriously think about your product line. Becky is stacking items on shelves. Balthazar sighs as Veronica comes up behind him, drapes her arm around him.

dialogues.speaker: VERONICA
dialogues.text: I think it's romantic. Dave looks at Balthazar, has never seen him so happy. EXT. NEW ARCANA CABANA — DAY One of those glorious New York days... Dave, Becky, Balthazar and Veronica stand on the sidewalk admire the new sign: "ARCANA CABANA - ANTIQUITIES, OBSCURITIES, UNUSUAL GIFTS - BALTHAZAR BLAKE, PROPRIETOR. Dave puts his arm around Becky.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: Want to see some magic?

dialogues.speaker: BECKY
dialogues.text: (smiles) Mm-hm.

dialogues.speaker: DAVE
dialogues.text: Close your eyes.  SE re ee ee

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: é 107. Dave smiles, is about to kiss her when Balthazar puts his hand on Dave's shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: Two o'clock. Training time. Veronica pulls Balthazar away, nods for Dave to continue.

dialogues.speaker: BALTHAZAR
dialogues.text: (off his watch) What? Two o'clock is training time. Dave smiles, kisses Becky as we PULL BACK INTO...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WE PULL BACK through the doorway, past shelves packed wit arcana, past the MUMMY CASE and the ANIMAL SKELETONS, unt we finally stop on... THE GRIMHOLD -- sitting in a specially reinforced glass c marked "DO NOT TOUCH." THE MORGANIANS -- stare demonically out at us, rendered i the style of a medieval stained glass. We hold on the GRIMHOLD, waiting for it to flinch, to bob something, but it never does as we slowly, very slowly... FADE TO BLACK.
